actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2107 of title 10, United States Code, to remove the limitation  on the number of cadets or midshipmen who may be appointed from the 2-year Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps course.

summary.text: Removes the present limitation on the number of cadets or midshipment who may be appointed from the two-year Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps course. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 2107 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2107 of title 10, United States Code, to remove the limitation  on the number of cadets or midshipmen who may be appointed from the 2-year Senior Reserve Officers' Training Corps course.
